hjz_zork

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Item

  • class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an item in the dungeon.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/09/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  Item.NoItemException
      Exception class representing when there are no items to read from a dungeon (.bork or .zork) file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        Item(java.util.Scanner fin)
throws Item.NoItemException
        Constructor for Item class.
        Parameters:
        fin - The Scanner reader of the dungeon (.bork or .zork) file to construct this Item from.
        Throws:
        Item.NoItemException - if there are no items to read from the dungeon file.
